boardgame.name: Tanto Cuore: Dokidoki Vacation
Tanto Cuore: Romantic Vacation
たんとくおーれ ~ドキドキ バケーション~
boardgame.description: Tanto Cuore: Romantic Vacation, the second expansion for the deck-building game Tanto Cuore in addition to being a standalone game, is themed around a paradise island vacation. (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Dokidoki_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, the sound of heartbeat in Japanese, means _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;exciting_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;romantic_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, which is why the English name is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Romantic Vacation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;.) Players take the role of house lords and start with a deck containing some love cards and a few maids. During the game, players gradually employ more maids, increasing their deck of cards, and the player who collects the most victory points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Romantic Vacation includes love cards and maid cards like the parent game, but no event cards (curse cards) nor private maids (unique cards with a lasting effect). Instead the game introduces reminiscence cards, representing memorial events, like _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Camp Fire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Watching the stars_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Picnic_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, etc. These cards are worth substantial victory points, but unlike the other victory points they are not bought with love, but gained by discarding a specified number of maid cards from your hand, thus introducing the possibility of getting victory points from pure maid cards, previously not possible. These reminiscence cards never enter a player's deck._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Japanime Games (JPG003) Tanto Cuore: Romantic Vacation, the second expansion for the deck-building game Tanto Cuore in addition to being a standalone game, is themed around a paradise island vacation. (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Dokidoki_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, the sound of heartbeat in Japanese, means _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;exciting_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;romantic_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, which is why the English name is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Romantic Vacation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;.) Players take the role of house lords and start with a deck containing some love cards and a few maids. During the game, players gradually employ more maids, increasing their deck of cards, and the player who collects the most victory points wins. Romantic Vacation includes love cards and maid cards like the parent game, but no event cards (curse cards) nor private maids (unique cards with a lasting effect). Instead the game introduces reminiscence cards, representing memorial events, like _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Camp Fire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Watching the stars_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Picnic_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, etc. These cards are worth substantial victory points, but unlike the other victory points they are not bought with love, but gained by discarding a specified number of maid cards from your hand, thus introducing the possibility of getting victory points from pure maid cards, previously not possible. These reminiscence cards never enter a player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s deck.

Japanime Games (JPG003) Tanto Cuore: Romantic Vacation, the second expansion for the deck-building game Tanto Cuore in addition to being a standalone game, is themed around a paradise island vacation. Players take the role of house lords and start with a deck containing some love cards and a few maids. During the game, players gradually employ more maids, increasing their deck of cards, and the player who collects the most victory points wins. Romantic Vacation includes love cards and maid cards like the parent game, but no event cards (curse cards) nor private maids (unique cards with a lasting effect). Instead the game introduces reminiscence cards, representing memorial events, like _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Camp Fire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Watching the stars_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Picnic_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, etc. These cards are worth substantial victory points, but unlike the other victory points they are not bought with love, but gained by discarding a specified number of maid cards from your hand, thus introducing the possibility of getting victory points from pure maid cards, previously not possible. These reminiscence cards never enter a player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s deck.

New, sealed. Some shelf wear on the box, including a tiny tear and some wrinkles in the cardboard.
